answers.answer: When I was pregnant with my first, I had gestational diabetes.... I wasn't allowed to eat any junk food.  Now with my second baby, I was not diabetic, therefore I ate everything I possibly could.  At that time, I worked in retail and I ate Chinese food EVERY day.  Its hard to turn away from those cravings.  Keep in mind that it is still very early and your cravings might change throughout!!!!!!!!!!!

I've been the same way! Today I wanted pizza so we got it n I ate 3 pieces!  I feel really bad cause I been eating bad but I always try to eat at least one fruit a day. I had Peaches earlier n ima finish them later. Lol I feel really bad tho cause I been wanting curly fries but haven't got em, I hope I don't either lol
I have been craving sweets as well. Favorites I have found are bananas! They are sweet and good for you. Also frozen yogurt, lol

I was like that early on. Only wanted junk food. I just ate however and when my hormones balanced out I started craving fruits and fresh veggies. I actually enjoy collard greens now. Usually I despise them. Wait and see how your cravings change later on.
I'm hoping they change soon, I've been trying my best to eat healthy, and it's more like fries, pizza, I want than sweets, and that is very unusual for me!

Anything junk food im lovin to ivr been bad through my pregmancy i havnt eatin healthy at all ive bern havin takeaways macdonalads kfc n anything cream cakes or chocolate or crisps mmmmm propper foods healthy foods nooo hehe

Anything junk food im lovin to ivr been bad through my pregmancy i havnt eatin healthy at all ive bern havin takeaways macdonalads kfc n anything cream cakes or chocolate or crisps mmmmm propper foods healthy foods nooo hehe
Isn't it the worst?! I know I should eat healthy, because I want the baby to be healthy and I don't want to get huge, but it's hard!!

question: Lately, I've been having SUCH bad food aversions, it's not funny. It seems the ONLY thing I can even think about eating is junk food!!! I am craving everything bad, and cannot fathom eating anything healthy, I honestly start gagging even thinking about forcing myself to eat something I don't want to eat! I don't know what to do, I was never this bad before I was pregnant, or while I was pregnant for my first. Should I just force myself to eat it? I've never had this problem! :(
title: Unhealthy cravings!!!
